attribute.value: select zb.zbdh as key,zb.zbmc as value from jsfa_jszb jszb inner join khdx_zb zb on zb.zbdh=jszb.zbdh inner join jsfa_fapz fapz on fapz.FABH=jszb.fabh where fapz.faly='3' and cast(substr(cast(fapz.khnf as char(8)),1,4) as integer) =$sysdate_yyyy$

select zb.zbdh as key,zb.zbmc as value from jsfa_jszb jszb inner join khdx_zb zb on zb.zbdh=jszb.zbdh inner join jsfa_fapz fapz on fapz.FABH=jszb.fabh where fapz.faly='2' and cast(substr(cast(fapz.khnf as char(8)),1,4) as integer) =cast(substr(cast($tjrq$ as char(8)),1,4) as integer)

select zb.zbdh as key,zb.zbmc as value from jsfa_jszb jszb inner join khdx_zb zb on zb.zbdh=jszb.zbdh inner join jsfa_fapz fapz on fapz.FABH=jszb.fabh where fapz.faly='3' and cast(substr(cast(fapz.khnf as char(8)),1,4) as integer) =$sysdate_yyyy$

select zb.zbdh as key,zb.zbmc as value from jsfa_jszb jszb inner join khdx_zb zb on zb.zbdh=jszb.zbdh inner join jsfa_fapz fapz on fapz.FABH=jszb.fabh where fapz.faly='3' and cast(substr(cast(fapz.khnf as char(8)),1,4) as integer) =cast(substr(cast($tjrq$ as char(8)),1,4) as integer)
select f_change_days(cast(s.csz as integer),-cast(c.csz as integer)) as maxqsrq from xtb_xtcs s,xtb_xtcs c where s.csmc='SYS_DATE' and c.csmc='SYS_CSTS'

select zb.zbdh as key,zb.zbmc as value from jsfa_jszb jszb inner join khdx_zb zb on zb.zbdh=jszb.zbdh inner join jsfa_fapz fapz on fapz.FABH=jszb.fabh where fapz.faly='3' and cast(substr(cast(fapz.khnf as char(8)),1,4) as integer) =$sysdate_yyyy$

select zb.zbdh as key,zb.zbmc as value from jsfa_jszb jszb inner join khdx_zb zb on zb.zbdh=jszb.zbdh inner join jsfa_fapz fapz on fapz.FABH=jszb.fabh where fapz.faly='3' and cast(substr(cast(fapz.khnf as char(8)),1,4) as integer) =cast(substr(cast($tjrq$ as char(8)),1,4) as integer)
select f_change_days(cast(s.csz as integer),-cast(c.csz as integer)) as maxqsrq from xtb_xtcs s,xtb_xtcs c where s.csmc='SYS_DATE' and c.csmc='SYS_CSTS'

sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select hy.hydh,hy.hymc,zb.zbmc,js.khdxdh,js.zbdh,js.bz,js.sdbs,js.qsrq,js.jsrq,js.khjs,dms.dmms bzmc,dms1.dmms sdbsmc from sgdr_hykhjs js inner join khdx_zb zb on js.zbdh=zb.zbdh inner join khdx_hy hy on js.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh inner join table(fn_getsjjg_java_qxhy($tjrq$, $login_khdxdh$, 0)) qx on hy.khdxdh=qx.khdxdh left join csb_dmms dms on js.bz=dms.dmz and upper(dms.dmmc)='ZBBZ' left join csb_dmms dms1 on js.sdbs=dms1.dmz and upper(dms1.dmmc)='ZBSDBS' where 1=1 and hy.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and $tjrq$ between js.qsrq and js.jsrq and js.zbdh=$zbdh$ and js.bz='$bz$' and js.sdbs='$sdbs$' order by zb.zbdh,js.qsrq desc

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select hy.hydh,hy.hymc,zb.zbmc,js.khdxdh,js.zbdh,js.bz,js.sdbs,js.qsrq,js.jsrq,js.khjs,dms.dmms bzmc,dms1.dmms sdbsmc from sgdr_hykhjs js inner join khdx_zb zb on js.zbdh=zb.zbdh inner join khdx_hy hy on js.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh inner join table(fn_getsjjg_java_qxhy($tjrq$, $login_khdxdh$, 0)) qx on hy.khdxdh=qx.khdxdh left join csb_dmms dms on js.bz=dms.dmz and upper(dms.dmmc)='ZBBZ' left join csb_dmms dms1 on js.sdbs=dms1.dmz and upper(dms1.dmmc)='ZBSDBS' where 1=1 and hy.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and $tjrq$ between js.qsrq and js.jsrq and js.zbdh=$zbdh$ and js.bz='$bz$' and js.sdbs='$sdbs$' order by zb.zbdh,js.qsrq desc ) t
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select ZBDH, KHDXDH, QSRQ, KHJS, JSRQ, SDBS, BZ from SGDR_HYKHJS where 1= 1 and ZBDH = $zbdh$ and KHDXDH = $khdxdh$ and QSRQ = $qsrq$ and SDBS = '$sdbs$' and BZ = '$bz$'

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select ZBDH, KHDXDH, QSRQ, KHJS, JSRQ, SDBS, BZ from SGDR_HYKHJS where 1= 1 and ZBDH = $zbdh$ and KHDXDH = $khdxdh$ and QSRQ = $qsrq$ and SDBS = '$zbsdbs$' and BZ = '$zbbz$'
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ insert into SGDR_HYKHJS( ZBDH, KHDXDH, BZ, QSRQ, SDBS, KHJS, JSRQ ) values ( $zbdh$,$khdxdh$,'$zbbz$',$qsrq$,'$zbsdbs$',$khjs$,$jsrq$)
sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update SGDR_HYKHJS set KHJS = $khjs$ where 1=1 and ZBDH = $zbdh$ and KHDXDH = $khdxdh$ and QSRQ = $qsrq$ and SDBS = '$zbsdbs$' and BZ = '$zbbz$'
sqlMap.delete: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ delete from SGDR_HYKHJS where 1=1 and ZBDH = $zbdh$ and KHDXDH = $khdxdh$ and QSRQ = $qsrq$ and SDBS = '$sdbs$' and BZ = '$bz$'
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ delete from SGDR_HYKHJS where qsrq >=$qsrq$ and ZBDH = $zbdh$ and KHDXDH = $khdxdh$ and SDBS = '$zbsdbs$' and BZ = '$zbbz$'
sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update SGDR_HYKHJS set jsrq=$qdate$ where $qsrq$ between qsrq and jsrq and ZBDH = $zbdh$ and KHDXDH = $khdxdh$ and SDBS = '$zbsdbs$' and BZ = '$zbbz$'
sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select max(qsrq) from SGDR_HYKHJS where 1=1 and ZBDH = $zbdh$ and KHDXDH = $khdxdh$ and SDBS = '$sdbs$' and BZ = '$bz$'

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select ZBDH, KHDXDH, QSRQ, KHJS, JSRQ, SDBS, BZ from SGDR_HYKHJS where 1=1 and ZBDH = $zbdh$ and KHDXDH = $khdxdh$ and SDBS = '$zbsdbs$' and BZ = '$zbbz$' and $qsrq$ > $maxqsrq$
sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update SGDR_HYKHJS set jsrq =29991231 where 1=1 and ZBDH = $zbdh$ and KHDXDH = $khdxdh$ and SDBS = '$sdbs$' and BZ = '$bz$' and jsrq =$lastjsrq$
sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select zb.zbdh as key,zb.zbmc as value from jsfa_jszb jszb inner join khdx_zb zb on zb.zbdh=jszb.zbdh inner join jsfa_fapz fapz on fapz.FABH=jszb.fabh where fapz.faly='2' and cast(substr(cast(fapz.khnf as char(8)),1,4) as integer) =cast(substr(cast($tjrq$ as char(8)),1,4) as integer)
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select f_change_days(cast(s.csz as integer),-cast(c.csz as integer)) as maxqsrq from xtb_xtcs s,xtb_xtcs c where s.csmc='SYS_DATE' and c.csmc='SYS_CSTS'

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select zb.zbdh as key,zb.zbmc as value from jsfa_jszb jszb inner join khdx_zb zb on zb.zbdh=jszb.zbdh inner join jsfa_fapz fapz on fapz.FABH=jszb.fabh where fapz.faly='3' and cast(substr(cast(fapz.khnf as char(8)),1,4) as integer) =$sysdate_yyyy$

javascript.edit: jQuery(document).ready(function () { //这里的js脚本，会在页面加载完成后执行 PAS.di.execute('hykhjsplgl_getMaxqsrq',getMaxqsrqBack);//加载最大的起始日期 $("#qsrq").executeOnEvent("blur","jgkhjsplgl_selectZBByTjrq2",changeZb2); setTimeout('triggerQsrqBlur()',1000); }); function triggerQsrqBlur(){ $("#qsrq").trigger("blur"); } function changeZb2(obj){ if(obj.status==0){ var data = obj.data; $("#zbdh").empty(); for(var i=0;i<data.length;i++){ var zbdh=data[i].KEY; var zbmc=data[i].VALUE; var opt=$("<option value='"+zbdh+"'>"+zbmc+"</option>"); $("#zbdh").append(opt); } } } //自定义验证，在提交时执行。通过返回true，否则返回false function customValidate(){ if(maxqsrq>parseInt($('#qsrq').val())){ parent.custom_alert('由于重算天数的限制，起始日期最大只能是：'+maxqsrq); return false; } return true; } function getMaxqsrqBack(obj){ if(obj.data.length>0){ maxqsrq = obj.data[0].MAXQSRQ; PAS.di.setDone(obj.sqlid); } }
